DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate potential metabolic effect resveratrol men metabolic syndrome ( otherwise healthy ) . The investigator hypothesize resveratrol anti-inflammatory effect , increase insulin sensitivity , change fat- sugar-metabolism , down-regulate bone-turnover .
DOC.detailed_description: The study do collaboration two PhD student , focus effect adipose- muscle- tissue , bone tissue respectively . The investigator look change - inflammation-markers - biochemical marker fat- sugar-metabolism - gene-expression fat- muscle-tissue - body composition ( DXA ( whole body ) MR spectroscopy ) - biochemical marker bone-metabolism - Bone Mineral Density ( DXA scan ) - bone structure ( QCT ) - gene-expression cytokine bone marrow Some volunteer insulin sensitivity measure .
DOC.criteria: Male 3060 year old Metabolic Syndrome Written inform consent Diabetes , thyroid parathyroid disease , hypogonadism Treatmentrequiring osteoporosis Heart , liver kidney disease Present previous malignancy MR contraindication Alcohol dependency Weight > 130 kilogram
